eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Gila; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; AT 09:48 PM ON NOV 28, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:48 AM NOV 29, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Pima County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Tucson Police Department is looking for Maria Wilson last seen on foot wearing a gray, long-sleeve, thermal shirt and dark-colored pants.  Maria is a black female, 5 feet 3 inches tall, 130 pounds, with gray hair and brown eyes. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
